name: Halloween: The 12 Cards Curse
description:
Halloween has been scattered by the Twelve Cards curse! 

All the objects necessary for the most terrifying and terribly amusing event of the year have been stolen and are now in the twelve cards!

We need you to recover them before the little witches, ghosts and other terrors start knocking to the doors!

Play it relax or play it with time limit! 

Play it alone or with all the family around the computer!

  • Spooky and funny, Halloween is the best event of the Year for parents and kids!
  • Twelve cards to unlock, each one of them covering a different part of the Halloween theme!
  • 120 levels to complete!
  • 4 difficulties to play with, from Easy to Very Hard!
  • Replay all the completed cards from the level you want
  • Lots of candies, ghosts, mini-monsters, potions and other Halloween amusing items!

Halloween: The Twelve Cards Curse is available on PC, MAC, LINUX.
